mapper.select: SELECT SAP_MAT_CD, SAP_MAT_NM FROM TB_GBCO_SAP_MAT_RCV_IZ WHERE SAP_MAT_CD = #{zsmtrl} /*SAP자재코드 - 그리드에서 입력받는 자재코드*/ AND ROWNUM = 1

SELECT T1.ZSSLRQ /*매출전표요청번호*/ , T1.ZSSLSQ /*일련번호*/ , T1.ZSIODT /*입출고일자*/ , T1.ZSSLTY /*매출유형*/ , T1.ZSORTY /*주문유형*/ , T1.ZSMTRL /*SAP자재코드*/ , (SELECT SAP_MAT_NM FROM TB_GBCO_SAP_MAT_RCV_IZ WHERE SAP_MAT_CD = T1.ZSMTRL AND ROWNUM = 1 ) AS ZSMTRL_NM /*자재명*/ , T1.ZSQNTT /*수량*/ , T1.ZSSAMT /*공급가*/ , T1.ZSVAMT /*VAT*/ , T1.ZSRTRN /*반품여부*/ , T1.ZSFREE /*무상여부*/ , T1.ZSPRFT /*사은품여부*/ , T1.ZSTAXG /* 과/면세구분*/ , T1.ZSBLTY /*세금계산서발행기준*/ , T1.ZSMNGR /*담당자코드*/ , T1.ZSREAL /*수불여부*/ , T1.ZSSASL /*저장위치*/ , T1.LGGUBN /*구분*/ , T1.LGMGUB /*매출구분*/ , T1.LGJDTE /*입력일*/ , CASE WHEN T1.ZSIFDT = '0' OR T1.ZSIFDT = ' ' OR T1.ZSIFDT IS NULL THEN '' ELSE 'Y' END AS TRANS_YN /*전송여부*/ , T1.ZSIFDT /*IF전송일*/ , T1.ZSSADT /*SAP반영일*/ , T2.ZSSLHQ /*사업부서*/ , T2.ZSDEPT /*조직정보*/ , T2.ZSCUST /*고객정보ID*/ , T2.UPD_ACT_DT /*수정일시*/ , (SELECT USR_NM FROM T_CMP_USR_ACO_M WHERE EPNO = T2.UPD_ACT_ID) AS UPD_ACT_ID /*수정자*/ , T2.REG_ACT_DT /*등록일시*/ , (SELECT USR_NM FROM T_CMP_USR_ACO_M WHERE EPNO = T2.REG_ACT_ID) AS REG_ACT_ID /*등록자*/ FROM TB_IFIN_SL_INF_ATC_IZ T1 /*ZA_매출정보항목내역*/ INNER JOIN TB_IFIN_SL_INF_HDR_BAS T2 ON (T1.ZSSLRQ = T2.ZSSLRQ) WHERE T1.ZSIODT LIKE #{baseYm} || '%' AND T1.ZSORTY = '00000003010005' AND T1.LGGUBN = 'LNC31' AND T1.ZSSLTY = '3006' AND T1.ZSSASL = '2018' AND T1.ZSBLTY = '4' AND T1.ZSTAXG = '0' AND T1.LGMGUB = '06' ORDER BY T1.ZSSLRQ, T1.ZSSLSQ
SELECT 'A' || #{baseYm} || 'L31' || NVL(LPAD(TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(MAX(SUBSTR(ZSSLRQ,11,5)))+1),5,'0'),'00001') AS ZSSLRQ FROM TB_IFIN_SL_INF_HDR_BAS WHERE ZSSLDT LIKE #{baseYm} || '%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_IFIN_SL_INF_ATC_IZ /*ZA_매출정보항목내역*/ VALUES (#{zsslrq} /*매출전표전송번호*/ , (SELECT NVL(MAX(ZSSLSQ),0) + 1 FROM TB_IFIN_SL_INF_ATC_IZ WHERE ZSSLRQ = #{zsslrq} ) , TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(#{baseYm} ,'YYYYMM')),'YYYYMMDD') /*ZSIODT*/ , '3006' , '00000003010005' , #{zsmtrl} /*자재코드*/ , #{zsqntt} /*수량*/ , #{zssamt} /*공급가*/ , 0 /*VAT - 모두면세 */ , '' /*ZSRTRN*/ , '' , '' , '' , '' , '' , '' , '' /*ZSGIFT*/ , '0' /*과세면세구분 - 0 */ , '4' /*세금계산서발행*/ , '' , 'X' /*수불*/ , '' , '2016' /*ZSPLNT*/ , '2018' /*저장위치*/ , '0' /*전송일자*/ , '0' /*SAP반영일자*/ , 'LNC31' /*업무구분코드*/ , '06' /*LGMGUB*/ , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') , '' , '' , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS') , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS') )

INSERT INTO TB_IFIN_SL_INF_HDR_BAS VALUES (#{zsslrq} /*매출전표전송번호*/ , TO_CHAR(LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(#{baseYm} ,'YYYYMM')),'YYYYMMDD') /*LSSLDT */ , '0000' /*ZSSLHQ*/ , 'Z000000' /*ZSDEPT*/ , '1000000009' /* ZSCUST*/ , (SELECT SUM(ZSSAMT) FROM TB_IFIN_SL_INF_ATC_IZ WHERE ZSSLRQ = #{zsslrq}) /*공급가액*/ , 0 /*VAT*/ , '' /*ZSIFCH*/ , '0' /*ZSIFDT*/ , '0' /*ZSSADT*/ , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') /*등록시간*/ , #{session.employeeIDNumber} /*세션의 EPNO - 등록자*/ , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') /*변경시간*/ , #{session.employeeIDNumber} /*세션의 EPNO - 변경자*/ , 'LNC31' /*SAP업무구분*/ , '06' /*SAP업무매출구분*/ , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') /*테이블등록일자*/ )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_IFIN_SL_INF_ATC_IZ /*ZA_매출정보항목내역*/ SET ZSMTRL = #{zsmtrl} /*SAP자재코드*/ , ZSQNTT = #{zsqntt} /*수량*/ , ZSSAMT = #{zssamt} /*공급가*/ , LGJDTE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') , FIMYMD = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') , FIMHMS = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS') WHERE ZSSLRQ = #{zsslrq} /*매출전표요청번호*/ AND ZSSLSQ = #{zsslsq} /*일련번호*/

UPDATE TB_IFIN_SL_INF_HDR_BAS SET ZSSAMT = (SELECT SUM(ZSSAMT) FROM TB_IFIN_SL_INF_ATC_IZ WHERE ZSSLRQ = #{zsslrq}) /*공급가*/ , UPD_ACT_ID = #{session.employeeIDNumber} /*세션의 EPNO */ , UPD_ACT_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') , LGJDTE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') WHERE ZSSLRQ = #{zsslrq} /*매출전표요청번호*/
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TB_IFIN_SL_INF_ATC_IZ /*ZA_매출정보항목내역*/ WHERE ZSSLRQ = #{zsslrq} /*매출전표요청번호*/ AND ZSSLSQ = #{zsslsq} /*일련번호*/
